name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: self-hosted  # Now runs on the worker node

    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
      with:
        ssh-key: ${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}

    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '18'

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm install

    - name: Build Docker image
      run: docker build -t vigneshdevsecops/simple-devops-app:${{ github.sha }} .

    - name: Login to Docker Hub
      uses: docker/login-action@v3
      with:
        username: ${{ secrets.vignesh-devops }}
        password: ${{ secrets.dockercredentials }}

    - name: Push Docker image
      run: |
        docker tag vignesh-devops/simple-devops-app:${{ github.sha }} vignesh-devops/simple-devops-app:latest
        docker push vignesh-devops/simple-devops-app:${{ github.sha }}
        docker push vignesh-devops/simple-devops-app:latest

    - name: Deploy to Kubernetes
      run: |
        kubectl apply -f k8s/deployment.yaml
        kubectl apply -f k8s/service.yaml
        kubectl rollout status deployment/simple-devops-app
